mapper.select: SELECT authority_code, screen_code, can_view, can_update FROM authority_screen_permission WHERE authority_code = #{authorityCode} ORDER BY screen_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO authority_screen_permission(authority_code, screen_code, can_view, can_update) VALUES(#{authorityCode}, #{screenCode}, #{canView}, #{canUpdate}) ON CONFLICT(authority_code, screen_code) DO UPDATE SET can_view = EXCLUDED.can_view, can_update = EXCLUDED.can_update
